## Data: 0/1/NA encoded

To explore the stages of the rhapsodi pipeline, we'll use a simulated dataset that was generated to reflect Sperm-seq data from a single donor with 
  * 50 gametes
  * 5000 SNPs
  * a coverage of 0.1
  * an average recombination rate of 1
  * a sequencing error rate of 0.005
  
This is the `sim01NA42` data.

## Data A/C/G/T/NA encoded

This is the `simACGTNA42` data.
